Class ArabicToRoman

java.lang.Object
ArabicToRoman
public class ArabicToRoman
extends java.lang.Object
Primary class for the S10_arabicToRomanGUI_Hard assignment for SWD Fall 2021.
Author:
aezouhri

  • Field Details

    • arabic_to_roman

      private final java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> arabic_to_roman
      The variable arabic_to_roman is a TreeMap that contains multiple arabic number keys and their roman number as values.

    • roman_to_arabic

      private final java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> roman_to_arabic
      The variable roman_to_arabic is a TreeMap that contains multiple roman number keys and their arabic number as values.

    • arabic

      private int arabic
      Arabic number either inputted or outputted.

    • roman

      private java.lang.String roman
      Roman number either inputted or outputted.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArabicToRoman

      public ArabicToRoman​(int number)
      Constructor for when an arabic number is the input. Constructs the TreeMap arabic_to_roman and sets the input number as the arabic variable.
      Parameters:
      number - is the user input to be converted in a roman number.

    • ArabicToRoman

      public ArabicToRoman​(java.lang.String text)
      Constructor for when a roman number is the input. Constructs the TreeMap roman_to_arabic and sets the input string as the roman variable.
      Parameters:
      text - is the user input to be converted in an arabic number.

      public void setRoman​(java.lang.String roman)

      Parameters:

    • toRoman

      public java.lang.String toRoman()
      Goal of this function is to convert an arabic number into a roman number. To do so it will run itself and toRomanUsingInt recursively looking for the lowest key value in arabic_to_roman until it can't anymore.
      Returns:
      final converted roman number.

    • toRomanUsingInt

      public java.lang.String toRomanUsingInt​(int num)
      Goal of this function is to convert an arabic number into a roman number. To do so it will run itself and toRomanUsingInt recursively looking for the lowest key value in arabic_to_roman until it cant anymore.
      Parameters:
      num - leftover number from toRoman(), as the recursive function loops the arabic inputted number will get smaller after matching a key.
      Returns:
      the current roman number ina string format we have reached so far.

    • toArabic

      public int toArabic()
      This function will convert a roman number to it's arabic equivalent.To do so it will check each character of the inputted string and match it with it's value using the roman_to_arabic TreeMap. Following that it will check whether if a value is less than the one on it's right to avoid issues like IX= 9=10 and instead will compute the difference.
      Returns:
      final converted arabic number

    • toArabicChecker

      public boolean toArabicChecker()
      This function is used to check if the toArabic() converted the roman number correctly. To do so it will run the toRoman() method using the output of toArabic() and compare the output with the user original user input in toArabic()
      Returns:
      Will return true if the roman number has correctly been converted to arabic, false otherwise
